page.title: 05LIFE in RHAYADER
page.content: Rhayader is a small market town with better than usual facilities for outdoor activities e.g.angling,rugby, football,bowling,cricket,tennis,pony trekking and walking.Facilities for indoor pursuits are limited. The retired members of the area enjoy a friendly atmosphere with good social and medical services.They also have several organisations to join. There are few job opportunities and young people usually need to travel for work.Facilities are limited and wages generally low.The percentage of married women in full time employment is low compared with more urban areas. Young people belonging to the farming fraternity tend to be quite happy but others would like more amenities. Food prices are usually 10-15% above urban prices,due to high transport costs and the low density population.
